protocol.text: RNA extracted according to Hennig et al. 2003, Plant Mol Biol 53, 457-465.
cRNA was labeled according to Hennig et al. 2003, Plant Mol Biol 53, 457-465.
Labeled cRNA was hybridized according to Hennig et al. 2003, Plant Mol Biol 53, 457-465.
protocol.type: nucleic acid hybridization to array protocol

protocol.text: Seed was germinated on vertically oriented agar plates containing half-strength Murashige-Skoog salts. After 6 days of growth under continuous illumination at 18 degrees Celsius, the seedlings were treated for the indicated time periods using the indicated chemicals. After treatment, 5 mm of the root tips were harvested and immediately subjected to the RNA extraction protocol.
